metadata.title: CVE-2016-3873 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.description: The NVIDIA kernel in Android before 2016-09-05 on Nexus 9 devices allowsattackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug29518457.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
